For sale is an exceptionally good looking lot of T cards already slabbed by TPG.  CHecks or MOs preferred.

T205 O'Leary SGC 40 $40 OBO
T205 Graham PSA 4 $100 OBO
T205 Knight SGC 50 $75 OBO
T205 Evans SGC 30 $35 OBO
T210 McCarthy PSA 4 $150 OBO
T212 ROth SGC 50 $125 OBO

Thanks

Jason

[url]http://s135.photobucket.com/user/iakona8/slideshow/Graded%20cards%20for%20sale/Tcards[/url]

Hi Jason,
It looks like you have a nice T212 collection so I thought I'd check with you on this card. I enjoyed your slideshow. Al Bonner was my grandfather. I only have been able to find and purchase one of his cards, a 1910 T212 Obak. It has the Obak advertising on the back. This one has the player description. Anyway probably a shot in the dark but thought I'd check.


Best Regards,
Terry Pierce
Seattle, WA.
